data.description:
Experience real racing on the Meta Quest!

Drive with automatic or manual gears
Steer using virtual hands

Virtual Gearstick in manual mode

The Demo contains
- 3 tracks
- 6 races
- 4 cars with 3 variations each

All constructive feedback is very welcome
Enjoy!

changelog.change_log: Many updates brought over from the full game Including Freeroam mode, engine damage and more...

DRIVEN DEMO V2.0

V2.0 incorporates many improvements developed for the full game.

- **PHYSICS**
AI collisions are less impactful
Cars have more weight and feel more realistic.

- **AI**
AI are now more aware of the players position and will be more reactive to avoid colliding

- **MAIN MENU**
Graphical refresh and less linear navigation

- **TIME TRIAL**
Complete races to enable Time Trial mode. Solo race avoid obstacles and navigating loops, bends etc.

- **Others**
Various graphical, audio and FX updates

I hope these updates improve your experience - please let me have any constructive criticisms you may have...

Cheers!

DEMO V1.5

Updated AI to be less aggressive - less likely to collide with player

Reduced impact collision when AI collides with player

Shortened gear shift movement

Updated engine sounds

Improved Pickup cars engine response

Improvements to car physics - more realistic feel

Various UI and graphical updates

BIG UPDATE!!!

2 New Tracks with 4 new races.  3 environments to choose from - Demo, City and Desert.

New Car - Buggy - perfect for racing through the desert...

Updated AI, UI and graphics

2 AI levels - Rookie and Pro - Pro increases AI ability but doubles prize

Selecting manual gearbox now adds extra 100 credits to race prize

Removed traffic races - to improve game responsiveness and to reflect the final game

Quest 2 now runs at 72Hz but at a higher resolution


I'd love to hear your thoughts, opinions, ideas - as long as they're constructive!!!  ;-)

Cheers!

New control option in the Settings menu
- Use grip buttons to hold the steering wheel. In manual gear mode a sequential gear stick is enabled allowing you to grip and push/pull (and/or use the Y/B buttons) to change gears.

 New race mode - Randomise - a random unlocked track and car are selected. 

 Other updates - More music, improved gear ratios for the Pickup, and grass patches...

This version replaces Version 1 and will reset the user profile
More Cars - Original 3 cars with higher power variants
Improved Steering - Better steering response means less need to reset position
Improved AI - More aware of surroundings so less likely to ram you
Car stability - Updated physics so less jittery - Improved aerodynamics, added anti-roll
Improved graphics - including skidmarks, tyre smoke, animated billboards, updated terrain textures
Removed Drone Cam for performance reasons
Low poly traffic - provides better game performance

Quest 1 users - please let me know how it performs as the demo was developed on a Quest 2

Cheers!
